page.topic: UX Component - Cordova Applications - Setting Default Properties for the Cordova Genie
page.description: When you build a Cordova application it is critical that you turn on all of the required plug-ins for your application in the Cordova Build Project Settings genie.

section.description: A property in the UX Builder allows you to specify that certain Cordova settings should be automatically set when a Cordova application is built using a particular component.

When you click the smart field for the Cordova default settings property, a dialog is shown where you can set certain Cordova Builder properties. When you open the Cordova genie, the corresponding properties in the builder will automatically be set.
